title: bronze players have zero macro
body:
i'll admit my macro is bad but its still probably better than the majority of the players in bronze, same with my csing (seeming how i constantly out cs the enemy adc) 

This ryze, i just played with, wanted to end after taking their mid inhib, instead of rotating bot and taking the inhib 

problems with ending: 
1. swain and shaco- can realistically hold 2 nexus towers
2, the rest of their team is up in 10 seconds or less 

5 minutes later....

we are going for baron, ryze once again wants to do baron while their WHOLE team is up and in their top jungle ( they literally just warded it), their shaco and Moakai are right behind baron, our ekko and ryze start it, i ping them off and ryze flames me and says its a 5v2 we can take it, 

Reality: their whole team is top jungle shaco and maokai are caught out, instead of risking baron like a dumbass would kill the 2 then take it, or have a 5v5 at baron and lose since we took baron damage and the vayne, swain and thresh will come in and we wont focus the damage dealers. 

All in all this ryze made a shit call every time,  resulting in me telling him he has no micro/macro so he then looks puzzled and ask me what that means before being defensive

[

replies.body:
macro is a terrible name for it

its better to just call it strategy

you can probably get banned for telling people they need more macro actually
Why else did you think they were in bronze?
i mean he had decent ryze mechanics but his macro is bad
